text: geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul-ui bimilseuleon daehwa ijeon-e huisageum-eul bepul-eoya ham-eul geunsimhaneun geos-inga? geulihayeo geudaedeul-i (huisaleul) haenghaji anh-assdamyeon hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-ui nwiuchim-eul bad-a jusyeossnola. geuleoni geudaedeul-eun kkujunhi yebaeleul deuligo uimu huisageum-eul naemyeo hananimgwa geubun-ui sadoleul ttaleula. hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-i haenghaneun il-e balg-eusin bun-ila
